workflow: Autonomous smoke test: Navigate site, explore main features, verify key elements

trace.thought: The goal is to navigate the site and explore main features. I am currently on the homepage. The next logical step is to navigate to the 'Products' page to explore the products. The knowledge bank contains a proven locator for the 'Products' link on the homepage, so I will use that.
